item.title: BC Leaders Launch Statewide Movement from Gadwal, Demand Constitutional Guarantee for 42% Reservations
item.description:
<![CDATA[Gadwal: A massive BC (Backward Classes) Awareness Conference was held at the district headquarters of Jogulamba Gadwal, where BC and Bahujan leaders came together demanding immediate legal implementation of 42% reservations for BCs through constitutional protection. The leaders accused both the central and state governments of continuously deceiving the Backward Classes despite repeated promises.
Speakers from across Telangana declared that the movement to achieve 42% BC reservations has begun ...]]>
item.author: The Hans India
